abstract: Man identified as ethnic Uighur who was hitting people with cement brick at train station in Xi'an, China, is shot and killed by police.
lead_paragraph: The man, an ethnic Uighur, was wounded and died later at a hospital, the Xi’an Railway Police said in a microblog post.

headline.main: Police at Chinese Train Station Kill Attacker Armed With Brick
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Assailant Killed at Train Station

snippet: The man, an ethnic Uighur, was wounded and died later at a hospital, the Xi’an Railway Police said in a microblog post.
